terms_of_service.introduction: Welcome to our Expl0it_Yours3lf. By using our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions.
terms_of_service.eligibility: You must be at least 12 years old to use this service. By registering, you confirm that you meet this requirement.
terms_of_service.account_responsibility: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and all activities under your account.
terms_of_service.booking_policy: Bookings are subject to availability and confirmation by the service provider. Any modifications or cancellations must comply with the provider's policy.
terms_of_service.payment_terms: All payments must be made through the app. Payment details are securely processed and stored in compliance with data protection laws.
terms_of_service.cancellation_policy: Cancellations made within 24 hours of the scheduled booking time may be non-refundable, depending on the providerâ€™s policy.
terms_of_service.privacy_policy_link: Please refer to our Privacy Policy for information on how we handle your data. /privacy
terms_of_service.prohibited_use: You agree not to misuse the app for illegal activities, spamming, or fraudulent bookings.
terms_of_service.liability_limitation: We are not responsible for any losses or damages resulting from use of the app, including missed bookings or service provider issues.
terms_of_service.modification_of_terms: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
terms_of_service.contact_information: For questions or concerns, please contact us at support@expl0it.xyz.

privacy_policy.introduction: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy_policy.data_collection: We collect data such as your name, email address when you create an account or make a booking.
privacy_policy.data_usage: Your data is used to process bookings, improve our services, and communicate with you about updates or promotions.
privacy_policy.data_protection: We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your personal information.
privacy_policy.third_party_sharing: We may share your data with service providers for booking purposes. We do not sell your information to third parties.
privacy_policy.data_retention: Your personal information will be retained for as long as your account is active or as required by law.
privacy_policy.cookie_policy: Our app uses cookies to enhance your user experience and analyze app performance.
privacy_policy.user_rights: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights.
privacy_policy.contact_information: For privacy-related inquiries, please email us at support@expl0it.xyz.

faqs.question: How do I make a booking?
faqs.answer: To make a booking, log in to your account, search for a service provider, and follow the booking steps.

faqs.question: Can I cancel or modify my booking?
faqs.answer: Yes, cancellations or modifications are allowed as per the service provider's policy. Please check the booking details.

faqs.question: Is my payment information secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use secure payment gateways and encryption to protect your payment details.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach out to us via the contact form on the app or email us at support@expl0it.xyz.
